'''Desert wells''' are structure-like [[feature]]s consisting mostly of [[sandstone]].

== Generation ==
Desert wells generate in [[desert]] biomes. They have a {{frac|1|1000}}{{only|java|short=1}} or {{frac|1|500}}{{only|bedrock|short=1}} chance to be generated in the given chunk. It is possible for a well to generate around a [[cactus]]. The well is considered a [[feature]] rather than a [[structure]], and therefore it generates with the "Generate Structures" option disabled.<ref>{{bug|MC-143151}}</ref>

{{Calculator|chunkbase|pois=Dw|zoom=0.25}}

== Construction ==
{{main|Desert Well/Structure}}
Desert wells are built of [[sandstone]] blocks and [[slab]]s with a [[water]] source inside. Underneath the water source are two [[suspicious sand]] blocks that can be [[brush]]ed to get various items. The first suspicious sand generates directly below the water source blocks, and the second generates below that layer.
